JUST IN: Disney Studios cuts ties with "Guardians of the Galaxy" writer and director James Gunn.

"The offensive attitudes and statements discovered on James’ Twitter feed are indefensible and inconsistent with our studio’s values," Disney says. ,https://,abcn.ws/2zShM3i, ,pic.twitter.com/zwlGwN9inD

NEW: James Gunn apologizes for past tweets: "I understand and accept the business decisions taken today...I take full responsibility for the way I conducted myself then. All I can do now, beyond offering my sincere and heartfelt regret, is to be the best human being I can be.",pic.twitter.com/YUMfHYGv85
MORE: Director James Gunn fired from "Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3" following "indefensible" past tweets. ,https://,abcn.ws/2Nv7Oae, ,pic.twitter.com/Khxi10rDxL

Offensive? To describe a suspected pedophile as offensive is ,#,FakeNews, 

How about criminal or disgusting and immoral? 

I’m sure that it’s more than offensive.

Hey, ,@,ABC, how about you report about all the other convicted Pedos Disney has hired and are still paying.

,#,Pedowood

Probably for the same reason that the NFL keeps giving athletes multiple "second chances". Their talent is worth the Risk/Reward ratio.

When are you going to cut ,@,TheView, what they did to ,@,JudgeJeanine, was disgraceful on air then for ,@,WhoopiGoldberg, to curse her after & tell her to leave the F***ing building is disgusting ,#,CancelTheView, or get new cast except ,@,MeghanMcCain, she is the only sensible one on there

“The best thing about being raped is when you’re done being raped and it’s like ‘whew this feels great, not being raped!” In another he joked that attending a meeting of the North American Man/Boy Love Association (NAMBLA) made him finally feel “…ok being who I am.”
